meanings.definition: An object kept as a reminder or souvenir of a person or event.
meanings.sent1: She treasured the memento from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The photo album served as a memento of their family vacation.
meanings.sent3: The memento of the lost sock brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: His old watch was a memento of time slipping away.
meanings.sent5: The faded ticket stub was a memento of the unforgettable concert.

meanings.definition: A keepsake or token of remembrance.
meanings.sent1: He kept the seashell as a memento of their beach trip.
meanings.sent2: The locket was a cherished memento of her late mother.
meanings.sent3: The memento of the broken vase made her laugh at the memory.
meanings.sent4: The worn-out bracelet was a memento of their enduring friendship.
meanings.sent5: The handwritten note served as a memento of their heartfelt connection.
